subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Juli Inkster shot a three-under-par 69 yesterday to lead by two shots and Michelle Wie had an 84 after the third round of the Evian Masters in Evian-les-Bains, France. Inkster finished at six-under 210 on a tough day for scoring because of swirling winds, tricky flag positions and difficult greens. Only seven players broke par.Jang Jeong of South Korea is second after a 72. Tied for third, three strokes back, are Sophie Gustafson of Sweden (72), Shin Ji-yai of South Korea (70) and Diana D’Alessio of the United States (76).
